titleStmt.title: Private devotions digested into six letanies; I. Of confession. II. Of deprecation. III. Of supplication. IV. Of Thanksgiving. V. Of intercession. VI. For the sick. VVith directions and prayers for the Lords day. Sacrament. day of Death. Judgment. And two daily prayers, one for the morning, another for the evening.
titleStmt.author: Valentine, Henry, d. 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Moseley at the Princes Arms in S. Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Arms in S. Pauls Church yard
